name: Procrastinaut
description:
Stare down the vast abyss of the unkown until the abyss stares back at you, and the prolonged eye-contact is kind of awkward. Then do something about it! Like, not now, but very soon. Just one more good stare is not going to kill you.

Explore


A malfunctioning ship and the loss of most of your equipment doesn't even slow you down. What secrets will await you in the foggy expanse of this failed star? Excitement? Danger? Maybe there's snacks?

Explore some more


You're definitely not just putting your mission off, you're charting new territory! It's time to face the elements with nothing but a high tech space suit and a healthy curiosity.

Key Features

  • Smooth platforming gameplay
  • An interactive environment
  • Procedual-ish storytelling
  • A wholly unproductive time-sink
  • Achievements, but you can do them later
  • Space-beer
